sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"请求，恳求"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: plead, appeal, beg, petition, entreat, pray
means: plead ： 指谦卑而又不失尊严地请求，侧重迫切感。
appeal ： 常指以道义原则为基础或以法律为依据的请求。
beg比plead通俗，不用于法律范畴，指低声下气地请求，有时含贬义，指某人喋喋不休地要求得到帮助。
petition ： 指正式而热切地请愿或祈求。
entreat的意义与beg的大致相同，但较文雅。
pray ： 指祈求，多用于宗教用语中。

sentence.Network_en: It was no defence to plead that they were only obeying orders.
sentence.Network_cn: 辩称他们只是在服从命令站不住脚。

sentence.Network_en: They will plead with him to pull back from confrontation.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们将请求他退出冲突。

sentence.Network_en: He would plead the cause of Russian unity.
sentence.Network_cn: 他会公开支持俄罗斯的统一。

有关法律方面的英文词汇 - 豆丁网 ... personnel handling a case 办案人员 plead guilty 认罪 plead not guilty 不认罪.
...禁止辩诉交易，刑事被告的处境会得到改善。但这里有理由证明，检察官的处境将得以改善。假设禁止辩诉交易，但被告可服罪（plead guilty）而不是诉诸法院，而且他一旦服罪即可减轻处罚。那么，大多数有罪被告都会服罪，从而检察官既可以节约审判成.

means.word_mean: 以...作为答辩;以...为理由;以...为借口

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'to wrangle'): from Old French plaidier 'go to law', from plaid 'discussion' (see plea)

entry.def: If you plead with someone to do something, you ask them in an intense, emotional way to do it.

example.ex: The lady pleaded with her daughter to come back home...
example.tran: 这位女士恳求她的女儿回家。

example.ex: He was kneeling on the floor pleading for mercy...
example.tran: 他跪在地板上请求宽恕。

entry.def: When someone charged with a crime pleads guilty or not guilty in a court of law, they officially state that they are guilty or not guilty of the crime.

example.ex: Morris had pleaded guilty to robbery.
example.tran: 莫里斯已承认犯有抢劫罪。

entry.def: If you plead the case or cause of someone or something, you speak out in their support or defence.

example.ex: He appeared before the Committee to plead his case...
example.tran: 他出现在委员会面前为自己辩护。

example.ex: He would plead the cause of Russian unity.
example.tran: 他会公开支持俄罗斯的统一。

entry.tran: 提出…为理由；把…作为借口
entry.def: If you plead a particular thing as the reason for doing or not doing something, you give it as your excuse.

example.ex: Mr Burke, pleading poverty, changed his mind...
example.tran: 伯克先生以自己穷为由改变了主意。

example.ex: Mr Giles pleads ignorance as his excuse...
example.tran: 贾尔斯先生把不知情当作自己的借口。

means.word_mean: 2. offer as an excuse or plea;
3. enter a plea, as in courts of law;
4. make an allegation in an action or other legal proceeding, especially answer the previous pleading of the other party by denying facts therein stated or by alleging new facts

sentences.en: She wept and pleaded until he agreed to do as she wished.
sentences.cn: 她哭着恳求他, 一直到他答应按她的愿望去做。

means.word_mean: 申诉; 答辩; 为…辩护

sentences.en: He had a good lawyer to plead his case.
sentences.cn: 他请了一位出色的律师为自己的案子辩护。

sentences.en: He pleaded that he was not guilty.

jushi.english: She wept and pleaded until he agreed to do as she wished.
jushi.chinese: 她哭着恳求他,一直到他答应按她的愿望去做。

jushi.english: The girl pleads not guilty to the crime.
